row.process:
!: set &task# = 'QA.FILEEVNT.U.CLEARING.CFB.CGM_01_FIXML_399' !: set &currentrunid# = get_statistic_detail(,runid,&task#) !: PRINT "Initial status of &task# ( &currentrunid# ) - &currentrunid#" !: WHILE &currentrunid# <> '' !!: SET &STATUS_CODE# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(&currentrunid#) !!: PRINT "Initial status of &task ( &currentrunid# ) - &STATUS_CODE#" !!: SET &KILL# = CANCEL_UC_OBJECT(&RUNID#, ENDED_TIMEOUT) !!: SET &DEACT# = DEACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(&RUNID#, FORCED) !!: SET &STATUS_CODE2# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(&RUNID#) !!: PRINT "Post kill attempt, status of &OBJECT# ( &RUNID# ) - &STATUS_CODE2# ( kill attempt returned : &KILL# )" !!: ENDWHILE !: set &retcode# = cancel_uc_object(&currentrunid#,,) !: PRINT "Initial status of &task# ( &returncode# ) - &returncode#"
: SET &OBJECT# = 'QA.FILEEVNT.U.CLEARING.CFB.CGM_01_FIXML_399' : SET &RUNID# = GET_UC_OBJECT_NR (&OBJECT#) : PRINT &RUNID# : SET &STATUS_CODE# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(&RUNID#) : PRINT "Initial status of &OBJECT# ( &RUNID# ) - &STATUS_CODE#" : SET &KILL# = CANCEL_UC_OBJECT(&RUNID#, ENDED_TIMEOUT) : SET &DEACT# = DEACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(&RUNID#, FORCED) : SET &STATUS_CODE2# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(&RUNID#) : PRINT "Post kill attempt, status of &OBJECT# ( &RUNID# ) - &STATUS_CODE2# ( kill attempt returned : &KILL# )" !: WHILE &RUNID# <> '' !: SET &STATUS_CODE# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(&RUNID#) !: PRINT "Initial status of &OBJECT# ( &RUNID# ) - &STATUS_CODE#" !: SET &KILL# = CANCEL_UC_OBJECT(&RUNID#, ENDED_TIMEOUT) !: SET &DEACT# = DEACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(&RUNID#, FORCED) !: SET &STATUS_CODE2# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(&RUNID#) !: PRINT "Post kill attempt, status of &OBJECT# ( &RUNID# ) - &STATUS_CODE2# ( kill attempt returned : &KILL# )" !: ENDWHILE
